report_title.description: The title of the market research report or presentation

executive_summary.description: A concise summary of the report's main conclusions and recommendations

finding.description: A key insight or conclusion from the research

supporting_data.description: Statistics, percentages, or data points that support this finding

source_visual.description: Description of any chart, graph, or diagram that illustrates this finding

key_findings.description: List of key findings and insights from the market research

market_size.description: Total addressable market size, value, or volume mentioned in the report

growth_rate.description: Market growth rate, CAGR, or growth projections

market_trends.description: Key market trends identified in the research

competitor.description: Name of the competitor or market player

insight.description: Key insight about this competitor's position, strategy, or performance

recommendations.description: Strategic recommendations or action items from the research

methodology.description: Research methodology, sample size, or data sources mentioned

settings.system_prompt: You are analyzing a market research presentation. Pay close attention to charts, graphs, diagrams, and visual data representations. Extract quantitative data from visualizations and describe the visual context for key findings.
